solution_line_template: Sophie has {initial_boxes} - {boxes_given_to_mom} = <<{initial_boxes}-{boxes_given_to_mom}={boxes_left_after_mom}>>{boxes_left_after_mom} boxes of donuts left.

The total number of pieces of donuts that she has is {boxes_left_after_mom} x {donuts_per_box} = <<{boxes_left_after_mom}*{donuts_per_box}={total_donuts_remaining_in_boxes}>>{total_donuts_remaining_in_boxes}.
She gave {donuts_per_box} / {half_divisor} = <<{donuts_per_box}/{half_divisor}={donuts_given_to_sister}>>{donuts_given_to_sister} donuts to her sister.

Therefore Sophie was left with {total_donuts_remaining_in_boxes} - {donuts_given_to_sister} = <<{total_donuts_remaining_in_boxes}-{donuts_given_to_sister}={donuts_left_for_sophie}>>{donuts_left_for_sophie} donuts after giving her sister.
